sentences.en: Do you assimilate all that you read?
sentences.cn: 你彻底了解你所阅读的一切 吗 ?
这食物易被消化[吸收] 吗 ?

sentences.en: Europeans and Jews do not readily assimilate.
sentences.cn: 欧洲人和犹太人不易同化.

sentences.en: He tried to assimilate himself into the new community.
sentences.cn: 他试图使自己与新社区的居民融为一体.

sentences.en: His family tried to assimilate into the white and Hispanic communities.
sentences.cn: 他一家人试图融入白人和西班牙裔社区。

sentences.en: I was speechless, still trying to assimilate the enormity of what he'd told me.
sentences.cn: 我无话可说，一时还无法接受他对我所说之事的严重性。

sentences.en: It will take time to assimilate all these facts.
sentences.cn: 充分掌握所有这些情况需要时间。

sentences.en: It's not easy to assimilate so many ideas.
sentences.cn: 吸收那么多思想很不容易.

sentences.en: Many people who are disillusioned in reality assimilate life to a dream.
sentences.cn: 许多对现实失望的人把人生比作一场梦.

sentences.en: My conscious mind did not assimilate this very well.
sentences.cn: 我的意识头脑并不能很好地明白这一切.

sentences.en: Refugees find it difficult to become assimilated into the community.
sentences.cn: 难民觉得难以融入社区。

sentences.en: Some foods assimilate / are assimilated more easily than others.
sentences.cn: 有些食物比另一些食物容易吸收.

sentences.en: Some foods assimilate more readily than others.
sentences.cn: 有些食物比别的食物容易吸收.

sentences.en: Some foreigners assimilate easily into our way of life.
sentences.cn: 有些外国人很容易被我们的生活方式同化.

sentences.en: The friend mixes koradji of this assimilate to apprentice.
sentences.cn: 有朋友把这比作巫师和学徒.

sentences.en: There is every sign that new Asian-Americans are just as willing to assimilate.
sentences.cn: 各种迹象表明新的亚裔美籍人简直一样愿意被同化。

sentences.en: We assimilate some kinds of food more easily than others.
sentences.cn: 我们对某些种类的食物比别的食物容易吸收.

sentences.en: We should critically assimilate whatever is beneficial in literature and arts from other countries.
sentences.cn: 我们应当批判地吸收别国文学艺术中一切有益的东西.

words.tran_cn: 同化的；同化力的；同化作用的
同化；吸收；[生化] 同化作用

trans.tran_en: if people assimilate, or are assimilated into a country or group, they become part of that group and are accepted by the people in that group

trans.tran_cn: 被吸收， 被消化； 被同化
trans.tran_en: if people assimilate, or are assimilated into a country or group, they become part of that group and are accepted by the people in that group
to completely understand and begin to use new ideas, information etc
